news_excerpt: Join us for our annual fundraising gala on October 15, 2026, celebrating the arts and community impact.
newscontent:
We're excited to announce our Annual Gala 2026, taking place on October 15th at the Grand Ballroom in Manhattan.

This year's gala will celebrate 15 years of bringing the arts to communities across New York City and beyond. Join us for an evening of music, art, and inspiration as we honor our donors, artists, and community partners who make our mission possible.

Tickets will be available starting in August. Stay tuned for more details!
